title: Looking for a Designer to Create the Design of a Mountain bike Riding Jersey
snippet:
Hey designers,

I own a clothing brand called Gravity. It's inspired by the Mountain Bike Downhill, Freeride, Slopestyle and Dirtjump culture; and is dedicated to this demographic.

My website is www.gravity-theshop.com; my Instagram account is @gravity_riders 

I currently only sell lifestyle clothing (hats, tees and hoodies).

In order to grow my brand, I will start selling "technical" riding gear like jerseys, shorts, gloves, etc.

Therefore, I'm looking for a designer to create the design of a mountain bike jersey. The design will include one of my logo that is currently used in one the tees of the Gravity collection. I will provide the logo that will need to be used in the general design of the jersey; and the jersey template.

Here are brand I want to model and / or that inspire me:

Fox: https://www.foxracing.com/us/mtb/
Troy Lee Design: http://www.troyleedesigns.com/
Rocday: https://www.rocday.com/?page=2&kat=1&lang=1
100%: http://www.ride100percent.com/mountainbike/mens-downhill/
Volcom: http://www.volcom.com/

If you're excited by this project, please apply for it! I'd be happy to work with you. 

Please include a link to a portfolio of your design so I can get a look and feel of your designs style.

Cheers,
